title: Lawyers for Former Uber Security Chief Say He Was Scapegoated by Company
description: A federal trial began on Wednesday for Joe Sullivan, a former federal prosecutor who is accused of not disclosing a data breach while at the company.

title: Apple Unveils New iPhone and Fitness Watch at Annual Event
description: For the first time in the pandemic, the company returned to Steve Jobs Theater to release its latest product updates.

title: Apple Unveils Smartwatch With a Focus on Fitness
description: For the first time in the pandemic, the company returned to Steve Jobs Theater to release its latest product updates.

title: One Solution to the Digital Divide: Teens
description: Closing the online gap in America will require everything we’ve got, including video game-playing teenagers.

title: Judge Says Musk Can Include Whistle-Blower Claims in Twitter Case
description: Elon Musk’s lawyers had asked for a delay to review the accusations by a former Twitter executive, which the judge denied, while allowing the information to form part of their case.

title: A judge allows Musk to include whistle-blower claims in his case against Twitter.
description: Elon Musk’s lawyers had asked for a delay to review the accusations by a former Twitter executive, which the judge denied, while allowing the information to form part of their case.

title: Join Us for a Screening of ‘The Murdochs’
description: Times subscribers can get a sneak peek of the documentary series on the legacy of the Murdochs, based on New York Times reporting.

title: The Supply Chain Broke. Robots Are Supposed to Help Fix It.
description: The companies behind e-commerce are embracing automation as the means of transcending the limitations of humans.

title: From Boom to Gloom: Tech Recruiters Struggle to Find Work
description: As tech companies slow hiring and lay off workers, once-busy recruiters are shifting to other roles and cutting their rates.
